name: SpinalOrthoticDeviceOrSupply
title: Spinal Orthotic Device or Supply
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Prefabricated, custom fitted, custom fabricated spinal orthotic devices and miscellaneous supplies to be used with the devices.),(Data Element Scope: Spinal orthotic devices and related supplies as defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Prefabricated, custom fitted, custom fabricated spinal orthotic devices and miscellaneous supplies to be used with the devices.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: Belt, strap, sleeve, garment, or covering, any type
Non-covered item or service
